Footer.slogan: Slippery weather alerts directly to your phone.

Warning.title: Liukasbotti
Warning.description: Liukasbotti provides warnings about extremely slippery pedestrian conditions via text message

Hero.desc: Get alerts about extremely slippery walking conditions directly on your phone. The service is free.

InfoBox.title: About Liukasbotti
InfoBox.text: The idea of Liukasbotti is to inform its users when it is especially slippery outside, in order to help prevent accidents.
InfoBox.subtitle: How it works
InfoBox.p1: You will receive a notification on your phone when it is unusually slippery outside and extra caution is required.
InfoBox.p2: The warning is sent at the start of slippery conditions.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: How do I get alerts on my phone?
FAQ.a1/1: You can subscribe to alerts on your phone
FAQ.a1/2: . When unusual slipperiness is detected, you will receive an alert directly on your phone.
FAQ.q3: Is the service only available in Helsinki?
FAQ.a3: At the moment, slipperiness alerts are only available for the Helsinki area.
FAQ.q4: Who is responsible for maintaining Liukasbotti?
FAQ.a4: Liukasbotti is maintained by Bravo Digital Inc.
